tags.tag-name: 多快好省地建设膜蛤文化

detail.title: 如何才能有感情的背诵葛底斯堡演说
detail.body:
顺便求大佬分享下蛤书记的演说 ！
https://transcoder.baiducontent.com/from=1000953c/bd_page_type=1/ssid=0/uid=0/pu=usm%402%2Csz%40320_1002%2Cta%40iphone_2_6.0_2_12137.1/baiduid=487E00C34BDBFC98C81A4886350CC901/w=0_10_/t=iphone/l=3/tc?ref=www_iphone&lid;=8572990910138177221ℴ=1&fm;=alhm&h5ad;=1&srd;=1&dict;=32&tj;=h5_mobile_1_0_10_title&wd;=&eqid;=76f961cfa5705800100000015b20d38c&w;_qd=IlPT2AEptyoA_ykxrPkc5RWuCUpScmEoyi1NafnVzAYrXh7qaq3&tcplug;=1&sec;=30488&di;=0b5573454e8e6a7e&bdenc;=1&tch;=124.0.262.190.0.0&nsrc;=IlPT2AEptyoA_yixCFOxXnANedT62v3IEQGG_yZO2zStoUSogrrgHtkfEFX6NWzTUS4ddT0LsxcGtXLR&clk;_info=%7B%22srcid%22%3A1599%2C%22tplname%22%3A%22h5_mobile%22%2C%22t%22%3A1528877967095%2C%22xpath%22%3A%22div-a-h3%22%7D

answers.body:
民有民治民享，葛底斯堡演讲之精华
民族民生民权，三民主义之根本
所以。。对待这种东西
请秉持三个**思想
献祭以时间生命
一定能感悟先驱们的思想
